articles.author: Simon Patterson
articles.title: Marquez exit only start of a MotoGP rider market 'earthquake' - The Race
articles.description: Marc Marquez's 2024 decision will only have a couple of knock-on effects on the rest of the grid. What he'll do in 2025 could change the whole landscape
articles.content: Its still not yet confirmed that Marc Marquez will join satellite Ducati squad Gresini Racing for 2024 but, with the news that hes going to split from Honda already official, its only a matter of tim… [+3988 chars]
